seo_keywords: Shop Vac bag for drywall dust

problems.title: Blowing Dust out of Exhaust
problems.description: Fine white dust shoots out the back when vacuuming.
possible_causes: Using wrong filter for drywall dust
solution_steps: Ensure the cartridge filter is locked down with the nut.
If vacuuming fine dust (drywall/ash), you MUST use a collection bag in addition to the filter.
Replace the cartridge if it has holes.
